string-array.name: dessert_description
string-array.item: Donuts are Glazed and sprinkled with Candy
Froyo is a premium self-served yoghurt
Ice cream has Chocolate and vanilla feeling
Kinderbueno is a premium self-served yoghurt
Jello has Chocolate and vanilla feeling
Brownies are Glazed and sprinkled with Candy
Milkshake is a premium self-served yoghurt
Macaron has Chocolate and vanilla feeling
